scripts.deploy-staging: env-cmd -f .env.staging yarn run build && aws s3 rm s3://admin.staging.connect.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync build/ s3://admin.staging.connect.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3PNLW70H60KAZ --paths /* --profile redi-connect-deployment
scripts.deploy-production: env-cmd -f .env.production yarn run build && aws s3 rm s3://connect-admin.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync build/ s3://connect-admin.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3ANNDV8BM7FUB --paths /* --profile redi-connect-deployment
scripts.deploy-demonstration: env-cmd -f .env.demonstration yarn run build && aws s3 rm s3://admin.demo.connect.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync build/ s3://admin.demo.connect.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E2UAAZQ3NXK4N6 --paths /* --profile redi-connect-deployment
